original_text: And I will bring upon Elam the four winds from the four quarters of heaven. And I will scatter them to all those winds, and there shall be no nation to which those driven out of Elam shall not come.
korean_text: 하늘의 사방에서부터 사방 바람을 엘람에 오게 하여 그들을 사방으로 흩으리니 엘람에서 쫓겨난 자가 가지 않는 나라가 없으리라

sentences.original_text: And I will bring upon Elam
the four winds from the four quarters of heaven.
And I will scatter them to all those winds,
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그들을 그 모든 바람에 흩으리니

sentences.original_text: and there shall be no nation
to which those driven out of Elam shall not come.
